thread.title: Chelsea star Victor Moses struggling with injury after Manchester United FA Cup clash
thread.title_full: Chelsea star Victor Moses struggling with injury after Manchester United FA Cup clash

author: louissealey1
title: Chelsea star Victor Moses struggling with injury after Manchester United FA Cup clash
text:
Victor Moses is believed to be struggling with a calf problem (Picture: Getty) Victor Moses is an injury doubt for Chelsea’s trip to Stoke City after pulling up in the FA Cup win over Manchester United, reports say.
The 26-year-old has flourished in a new wing-back role under Antonio Conte this season, playing 26 of the club’s 27 Premier League games.
Chelsea on red alert as Koeman admits Everton could be forced to sell huge star According to the Evening Standard , the Nigeria international sustained a calf problem in the 1-0 victory against Jose Mourinho’s United on Monday.
Subsequently, Moses is in a race to regain his fitness before Saturday’s clash at the Britannia Stadium, with Conte preparing to make a change to his defence.
The Italian boss could opt to offer Kurt Zouma or former Bournemouth loanee Nathan Ake a rare start in the Premier League, or ask Spaniard Pedro to adopt a deeper role.
Pedro may adopt a deeper role for the Premier League leaders (Picture: Getty) More: Football Arsene Wenger speaks out on Barcelona's interest in Hector Bellerin
